about_the_game:
This is the demo version of Kuma's Panties.
- The playable area is limited to the forest area.
- It can be enhanced through several skill trees and panties growth recipes.
- Survive for 5 days! The farm is available, but only one space is provided.
- Drifting survivors and the hunter will come on the last night.

There is always danger lurking in the wild.


Choose whether to run away or fight!
5 days of survival, a hunter who comes at night
Drifting survivors and numerous animals may be a threat to me,
but they may also be a good resource!

Harsh environments and natural disasters are always a threat!


Find your own way to survive!
Natural disasters as well as local climate can be fatal.

Get the upper hand with efficient and strategic production!


Expand your strategic scope through area marking and trap making!
You can enhance the area marking installed with reinforcement!
Try to attack to your advantage in your own area.

You can strategically use resources for skills, panty growth, production,
and more to find the best way to survive.

name: Kuma's Panty Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 / AMD Radeon HD 5570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - i7 Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 750Ti / AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: A weak bear wore panties to become stronger!? You only have 30 days to spend with Panty! Survive together! Survive in the harsh nature and walk the path to power that plunders everything. As long as you have Panty, you have nothing to fear in the world!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Vietnamese, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Thai, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Korean
